ygData.subject: RE: Full Report!
ygData.msgSnippet: I am level 31 with a maxed out swimming skill.  There is nothing in that deep hole, it just dead-ends.  I haven t tried bumping around to see if the walls are
ygData.messageBody:
I am level 31 with a maxed out swimming skill. There is nothing in that deep
hole, it just dead-ends. I haven't tried bumping around to see if the walls
are secret however. To get my skill maxed I have swam ALL around the Ak'anon
underground sea, specifically looking for tunnels or any hidden routes. I
didn't find anything special. I am however in Ak'anon as we speak and will
look around when I get home, if the wife permits. ;)

-Kryogen Katspaw

--- Chuck Krauth <chuck.krauth@...> wrote:
> The coins are for something else, but the water clue at least makes me think
> of something. There's a really deep section of water at the bottom of
> Akanon by the mines. I tried swimming to the bottom as a newbie, but didn't
> have the air. Later, once my swimming was at a reasonable level, I did make
> it down and tried swimming into the walls in all directions. I was really
> looking for a passage or something like that. If anything was lying on the
> ground and didn't stand out, I could easily have missed it. Anyway, it's a
> bit strange for the 'abyss' to be there without a purpose. Well lets hope
> it isn't just a newbie deathtrap.
>
> Kazaan on Veeshan
>
<HR>




=====
